name: Heroes of Dunia
description:
This game is created for Bored Pixels Jam 8: You Are Not The Hero.

Three heroes were summoned to Dunia. They were only students and didn't know anything about fighting. Your task is to prepare them for their journey in 7 days.

Train the kids according to their base stats to ensure they meet the minimum stats for each job. There are 3 endings based on the final stats.

---

This is my second solo project. The arts and animations are still unpolished. It's also my first time making music. I hope you still have a good experience.

  • Art is created in Aseprite.
  • Developed using Godot.
  • Bgm and some of the sfx is created in Petaporon
  • Other sfx:
    • Sword by quedicemipez from freesound
    • Wind by 6912419 from freesound
    • Magic by alanmcki from freesound
  • Font:
    • Kenney Pixel and Kenney Mini
    • Anonymouse Pro

---

Known bug: When you press replay, it will only have 1 day instead of 7. Please refresh instead. Thanks!

---

Spoiler:

Minimum requirements for normal ending:

KnightMageArcherHP 90 40 90 MP 30 90 40 Strength (Str)60 15 2 Intelligence (Int)2 60 14 Speed (Spd)2 2 60

(Taekwondo girl at least 5x Sword Training. Studious girl at least 5x Magic Training. Football boy at least 5x Agility Training)

Minimum requirements for good ending:

Knight Mage Archer HP 90 40 90 MP 30 90 40 Strength (Str) 60 2010Intelligence (Int) 1060 20Speed (Spd) 201560

(Taekwondo girl 5x ST, 1x MT, 1x AT.
Studious girl 1x ST, 5x MT, 1x AT.
Football boy 1x ST, 1x MT, 5x AT)
